name: VoiceinEducation
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: A weekly flash briefing that will give educators tips and resources to use voice assistants for educational purposes in ways that will benefit student learning but keep student privacy in consideration.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
